import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import { getDetails } from '../../Redux/actions' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' export const Details = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const detailsCountry = useSelector((state) => state.details) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getDetails(props.match.params.id)) },[dispatch, props.match.params.id]) return (
{ countriesDetail.length ?

{countriesDetail[0].name}

Id: {countriesDetail[0].id}

Capital: {countriesDetail[0].capital}

Continente: {countriesDetail[0].continent}

Subregion: {countriesDetail[0].subregion}

Area: {countriesDetail[0].area} km2

Poblacion: {countriesDetail[0].population}

{countriesDetail[0].activities?.map(el=>{ return(

Actividad

{el.name}

Dificultad: {el.difficulty}

Duracion: {el.duration}

Temporada: {el.season}

)})}
:

Loading...

}
); }
